infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need to know your current location to find the near by golfers and courses. Do you allow this app to use location service on this device?
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need to access to your camera in order to take avatar picture. Do you allow this app to access your camera?
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We need access to you photo library in order to select photos for avatar and created games. Do allow this app to access you gallery?
